title: Citigroup Co-President and CEO of Global Consumer Banking Manuel Medina-Mora to Present at the Bank of America Merrill Lynch 2013 Banking & Financial Services Conference
summary: New York - Manuel Medina-Mora, Co-President of Citigroup and Chief Executive Officer of Global Consumer Banking, will present at the Bank of America Merrill Lynch 2013 Banking & Financial Services Conference on Tuesday, November 12, 2013. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 10:30 a.m. (Eastern). A live webcast will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.

The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 10:30 a.m. (Eastern). A live webcast will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. tag-3: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
